mapper.delete: delete from t_sales_result where batch_month = to_char(date_trunc('month', now()), 'yyyymm') and company = #{company} and department = #{department} and (handwrite is null or handwrite = 'N')
mapper.insert:
insert into t_sales_result ( sales_result_id, company, department, site, client, brief, project_name, total_sales_amount, total_purchase_amount, batch_month, handwrite ) ( select nextval('t_sales_result_sales_result_id_seq') sales_result_id, t2.company, t2.department, t2.site, t2.client, t2.brief, t2.project_name, sum(t2.sales_mm * t2.sales_unit) total_sales_amount, sum(t2.purchase_mm * t2.purchase_unit) total_purchase_amount, to_char(date_trunc('month', now()), 'yyyymm') batch_month, 'N' handwrite
from t_sales_ledger t1 inner join t_emp_ledger t2 on t1.emp_id = t2.emp_id inner join t_emp_pool t3 on t2.emp_pool_id = t3.emp_pool_id WHERE t2.company = #{company} and t2.department = #{department} and (t1.del != 'Y' or t1.del is null) and t1.include = 'Y' and (t2.assign_date <= date_trunc('month', now()) + interval '1 month - 1 day' or t2.assign_date is null) and (t2.resign_date >= date_trunc('month', now()) or t2.resign_date is null) group by t2.company, t2.department, t2.site, t2.client, t2.brief, t2.project_name )
